description:
Alan was sitting behind Kurt on the sofa, rubbing Kurt's shoulders and chest.

"It's been a while, actually," Kurt said, referring to the fact the hadn't been fucked in quite a while. "It's like riding a bike, though."

"I think you'll be all right," Alan said, patting Kurt's chest.

I liked the little gleam in Alan's eyes. You could tell he was up for this! He teased Kurt a little by caressing his ticklish nipples, and then started rubbing his shoulders.

Then, Alan leaned down and started kissing Kurt's neck.

You know, for a newbie, Alan eats AND fucks ass pretty darn well!
title: Alan & Kurt
